name: GRID
overview: Get on the Grid and get ready for the race of your life. Drive some of the worlds most legendary, most desirable and fastest cars such as the Pagani Zonda, the Bugatti Veyron and the Aston Martin DBR9. And what better place to race these iconic cars than on some of the world's most famous tracks. Have you got what it takes to take on the likes of Donington Park, Spa Francorchamps or Okutama Grid?  Its all about the race!
